text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS How much does it cost the American people for you to play your quick round of golf? How much does your resort profit while you enjoy a quick round of golf? Where were you in January and February when you should have been addressing the coronavirus? Maybe playing golf?

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
